title: Force Of Destiny: Sunset & Vine
description: “Danger, Deceit and Betrayal."Ruthless friction pits Old World Elites vs. Brilliant, fearless new players armed with trillions and 21st century tech.Heavyweights California, The Vatican, Washington, D.C and Globalist China, do battle.”Times have changed, trillions vs. billions - hyper-sonic vs. Jets.There’s a new Boss in town, Montague Stanford.
author: Per Hampton
